note.p: American. Daughter of Abraham Marcy of Burlington, Otsego, New York. Married to John Bishop (1822–1911), tailor, later farmer, of Burlington, by 1850. Mother of Irving Prescott Bishop.
D. Hamilton Hurd, ‘History of Otsego County, New York, 1740–1878’, theusgenweb.org/ny/otsego/bios/miniburlington.htm (accessed 29 October 2020)
New York, State Census, 1865 (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
United States Federal Census 1850 (Burlington, Otsego, New York [1]/16b) (Ancestry.com, accessed 29 October 2020)
U.S., Find a grave index, 1600s–current (Ancestry.com, accessed 28 October 2020)
